item.title: About
item.description: Projects Calculator Made a calculator in react with semantic ui for styling to get a better understanding of how to make components interact with each other. Timestamp Microservice Created a small API, you can pass it either a unix timestamp or date. It returns both a unix timestamp and date in the form of a JSON object. If neither a unix timestamp or date is passed it returns null.
